great, clear subs. No karaoke that ruins the opening and endings either. :D

I usually point out TL errors but there are too many to list. Shinsen is just as bad. A-Thryst is good but slow. The best option now (Feb19) is to watch non-English subs or raws. Use another player if you see the ugly font; it's not Ronery's fault.
Don't translate everything.

some oddities in English, subs are too big, and the karaoke style doesn't suit the show. also the opening tends to freeze. tolerable to watch (as they're only ones subbing weekly), but not for archiving
sucks at the beginning, but gets better and better.. =)

Constant mistranslations (do they even look at the kanji in the hearing-impaired subs?) Sometimes the key noun is completely wrong. Constantly have to relisten to Japanese and ignore the subs. Even when the translations is right the English is almost inco
Didn't translate honorifics, so we got English adressing English as West-sama, Angela-san etc. Annoying a lot

My Japanese is in  kindergarten level but even I could tell they made huge mistakes in the translation! And their final product it's so incoherent, so garbled and confusing that it's easier to understand the raws rather than their subs!
Not as good quality as Shinsen, but its out in the same week as RAW! Rock on Ronery
bad translation
